title: Venus in Aries
summary: Relational energy is bold and straightforward. Desire expresses quickly, and appreciation shows up through action more than words. The opportunity is to initiate with clarity while respecting boundaries.

meaning.headline: Connection seeks immediacy, honesty, and movement.

frames.text: Venus in Aries favors direct signals of interest, quick decisions, and spontaneous pleasure.
Affection can look like taking initiative or making the first move.
People may prefer clear yes/no invitations over hints.
Passion rises when there is challenge or novelty.

opportunities: Making a clear ask or plan

do: Check for mutual interest before accelerating.
Be honest about what you can commit to.
avoid: Overpromising in the heat of the moment
Dropping follow-through after the initial spark

reusable_lines.text: Show interest clearly and check that it is welcome.
Energy rises when desire meets mutual consent.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can energize connection and initiative
Agency-forward language: you choose how to engage
Contextual framing: immediacy helps when paired with respect

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
